still_setup.options: Whisky helmet, 1 long + 3 short tube sections

dilution_steps.notes: Final Navy recipe; condenser perfectly stable

still_setup.options: Whisky helmet, 1 long + 3 short tube sections

dilution_steps.notes: Proofed to 59.3% after leak check; condenser temperatures stable.

still_setup.options: Whisky helmet, 1 long + 3 short tube sections

dilution_steps.notes: Proofed to 60.5%; warm ambient led to slightly higher condenser temps but no distortion in hearts cut.

still_setup.options: Whisky helmet, 1 long + 3 short tube sections

dilution_steps.notes: Proofed to ≈ 59.7 % ABV; exceptionally clean cut and stable condenser. Baseline Navy recipe confirmed for 2022 production.

notes: Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin batch. Botanicals scaled to 23 g/LAL. Run performed on Roberta still with whisky helmet and standard 14 h steep.

dilution_steps.notes: Moved from VC230-01 to VC330-02 for proofing

notes: Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin run on Roberta. Total yield ≈ 220 L hearts @ ~84 % ABV diluted to 58.9 %. Botanicals 23 g/LAL.
Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin run on Roberta. Hearts ≈ 306 L @ ~82 % ABV (≈ 241 LAL) diluted to 412 L @ 58.6 %. Maintained 23 g botanicals/LAL.
Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin run on Roberta. Hearts ≈ 282 L @ 81 % ABV (≈ 257 LAL) diluted to 412 L @ 58.6 %. Power adjusted progressively from 4×5750 W to 2×5750 + 1×2200 W.
Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin run on Roberta. Hearts ≈ 260 L @ 80.9 % ABV (≈ 233 LAL). Maintained consistent 23 g/LAL botanical ratio, using standard four-element Roberta configuration.

Full 1000 L Navy Strength Gin run on Roberta. Hearts split between VC-230 (187 L) and VC-100 (99 L). Total ≈ 286 L @ ~81 % ABV before proofing; diluted with 118 L water to ~59 %. Standard element configuration and flow ≈ 40 L/h.
Carry still run with six elements active (plus 2200 W assist). Charge = 1000 L @ 55 %. Total yield ≈ 288 L hearts @ ~80 %. Maintained 23 g botanicals / LAL standard ratio.

Carrie still run (first of 2025). Charge: 1000 L @ 50.3 %. 306 L hearts collected @ 82 %, proofed to 425 L @ 59.1 %. Tails kept for vodka redistillation. Maintained standard botanical charge (20.2 g/LAL).

botanicals.name: Orange
botanicals.notes: 8 fresh navel orange rind – used for 200 mL bottles (36 total)

notes: Micro-scale Navy Strength trial run (20 L charge, Carrie still). 206 g botanicals ≈ 20.6 g/LAL to match production standard. 5.8 L collected @ ~80 %. Used for 36 × 200 mL bottles test fill.

distillation.observations: Hearts collected at 81.6% ABV, heating run 2 * 5750W at 36L/h
